name: @asklddco/react-table
description: A simple React Table. 4 design presets & customisable Font. More to be added soon.

scripts.build: tsc && xcopy .\package.json .\dist /y && xcopy .\src\style .\dist\style /y /e /i && xcopy .\README.md .\dist /y && xcopy .\src\select\style .\dist\select\style /y /e /i && npm publish .\dist
